title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Fireplace Wall Mantel, Furniture", 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: Heifetz [underlined]/Mantel
description: Design for fireplace wall mantel for Jascha Heifetz apartment. Rectilinear fireplace with reflective surface, either tile or polished stone. Smooth, undecorated surface above fireplace. Adjacent shelving and cabinet unit to right of fireplace with five shelves above unit. Base has one drawer above a two-door cabinet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Fireplace Wall Mantel, Furniture", 1935.
1935. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-261.
